# Roleplay Rule 16 - Use appropriate names for characters [color=SlateGray][italic]Revision A, 2025-10-11[/italic][/color]
All names must not breach server rules or exploit in-game naming mechanics.
Roundstart names must not contain: - Non-familial titles - Numbers - Emojis - Unrecognisable symbols
Additionally, roundstart names must not be: - Recognisable figures - Unpronouncable - Mispunctuated - Miscapitalized - Low-effort
Silicon names are exempt from roundstart name rules. Stage names (Clown, Mime, Musician) may have titles and looser restrictions for "low-effort" names.
## MRP Amendment Character descriptions must not include intangible details such as relationships, background, and work history.
## Conventions and Examples Humans follow a "'first name' 'surname'" convention: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Tom Fisher - Tom J. Fisher - Tom Jay Fisher - Spacey Chapman - Spacey Chapman Jr. III
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - bob bifel (miscapitalized) - Dr. Tom Fisher (contains title) - Walter White (recognizable figure) - George Washington (recognizable figure) - Joe Biden (recognizable figure) - Ben Dover (low-effort, breaches server rules) - MIKE HUNT (low-effort, breaches server rules, miscapitalized)
Dwarves follow human names of Scandinavian origin: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Ingrid Firebreath - Björn Lightningclaw - Åse Forgebreaker
Reptilians follow a "'Verb'-'article'-'Noun'" convention: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Cleans-the-Airlocks - Ber-Mei
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Runs from Trouble (mispunctuated) - Bans-the-Admins (low-effort)
Slime People follow an onomatopoeia theme: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Foolp Suub - Foolp
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Slime (low-effort)
Diona follow a serene nature-themed "Noun of Noun" convention: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Petal of Tranquility - Garden of Relaxation
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Tree but Alive (low-effort)
Moth People follow human names of Latin origin or with a light theme: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Socrates Temnora - Sierra Lightseeker - James Nightflitter
Arachnids follow human names of Latin origin: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Argyroneta Reticulatus - Loxosceles Domesticus - Spider-Man (low-effort, recognizable figure)
Vox are made up of repeating syllables: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Hirixashahre - Xapikrikrik
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Chipikirchitchitchitbecretretrer (unpronouncable) - Trololol (low-effort) - Skibidi (low-effort)
Vulpkanin follow human names with a Slavic theme: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Małgorzata Nowak - Svetlana Olegovna
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Furry (low-effort) - Vladmir Lenin (recognizable figure) - Grzegorz Brzęczyszczykiewicz (recognizable figure, unpronouncable)
Other examples of inappropriate names: [color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - XxRobustxX (low-effort, unpronounceable) - SDpksSodjdfk (low-effort, unpronounceable) - Lkdsoisgoieun (low-effort, unpronounceable) - :3 (low-effort, unpronounceable) - john spacestation (low-effort, miscapitalized) - Greytide (low-effort) - Passenger (low-effort) - Admin (low-effort) - Game-Master (low-effort) - Jane (low-effort) - Joe Mamma (low-effort) - Joe McRogan (low-effort) - The Drunk (low-effort, recognizable figure) - Mark Not a Lizardman Zuckerber (low-effort, recognizable figure) - Urist McHands (meta name; default for admin-spawned humans) - Middle-Aged Man (meta name; default for obscured identities) - Operative Whiskey (meta name; naming pattern of nuclear operatives)
